  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3746</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3746</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">La Cristobal web d'Educació Física</string>
            <string language="en">The Cristobal physical education web</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Cristobal Web der Leibeserziehung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Web d'éducation physique de Cristobal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Web da instrução física de Cristobal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Web di formazione fisica di Cristobal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο Ιστός φυσικής αγωγής Cristobal</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pàgina web personal d'un professor d'un centre d'Educació Secundària en què es posen en comú les experiències i els recursos que treballa. Inclou programacions, material i unitats didàctiques d'hoquei, corfbol i exemples d'acrosport, entre d'altres.</string>
            <string language="en">Personal webpage of a secondary school teacher on his experiences and resources he works with. It includes programmes, material and teaching units for hockey, korfball and examples of acrosport, inter alia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">lloc Internet</string>
            <string language="en">Internet site</string>
            <string language="es">sitio Internet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">educació física</string>
            <string language="en">physical education</string>
            <string language="es">educación física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">esport</string>
            <string language="en">sport</string>
            <string language="es">deporte</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Persönliche Webseite eines 
Sekundärschulelehrers auf seinen Erfahrungen und Betriebsmitteln, die
er mit bearbeitet. Sie schließt die Programm-, materielle und 
Unterrichtenmaßeinheiten für Hockey, korfball und Beispiele 
von acrosport, unter anderem ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Page Web personnelle d'un professeur d'école 
secondaire sur ses expériences et ressources qu'il travaille avec. 
Elle inclut les unités de programmes, matérielles et 
d'enseignement pour l'hockey, le korfball et les exemples de 
l'acrosport, entre autres.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Web page pessoal de um professor da escola 
secundária em seus experiências e recursos que trabalha com. 
Inclui as unidades dos programas, as materiais e ensinar para o 
hockey, o korfball e os exemplos do acrosport, alia inter.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Web page personale di un insegnante della scuola 
secondaria sulle sue esperienze e risorse che lavora con. 
Include le unità materiali e di istruzione di programmi, per 
hockey, korfball e gli esempi di acrosport, inter alia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προσωπικό webpage ενός δασκάλου δευτεροβάθμιας 
εκπαίδευσης στην εμπειρία και τα στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς του 
εργάζεται με. Περιλαμβάνει τα προγράμματα, τις μονάδες 
υλικού και διδασκαλίας για το χόκεϋ, korfball και τα 
παραδείγματα του acrosport, μεταξύ άλλων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Internet-Site</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leibeserziehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sport</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Site Internet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">éducation physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sport</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Local de Internet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">instrução física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">esporte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Luogo di Internet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">formazione fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sport</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χώρος διαδικτύου</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φυσική αγωγή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αθλητισμός</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
